title: Where to Find Azir Soldier Models?
body: I can find Azir's model easily enough on lolking, but I can't find the solder models. Does anyone know where I can find them? I need both the wall soldier and the spear soldier models, because I'm planning a massive, 10 (hopefully) person Azir group cosplay.

replies.body: Not exactly models, but I took a few [in-game snapshots](http://imgur.com/a/32Yf3) for you! :D

inb4ritonewscast from a helicopter.
Today Azir was found lying in wait in a river.
Phreak was quoted on the report by saying "Tons of damage"

> Not exactly models, but I took a few [in-game snapshots](http://imgur.com/a/32Yf3) for you! :D

So quickly becoming one of my favorite Rioters.

Also, I can't stop thinking about this scene whenever I see Shuriman soldiers with their wacky helmets:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uwnfBrpdIpc

(Summoner Daniel Jackson explaining what's in the League's archives about ancient Shurima, as Azir's arrival renews interest in that time period. Nasus, overseeing the research, is reminded of an absolutely hilarious joke that fails to translate well.)

Thanks for the shots! I was hoping for models because it makes measurements a little easier due to being able to remove the angle of incidence, but I should be able to work around that. I don't suppose anyone just happens to know the default (aka unhacked) angle of incidence for League? (just for bonus accuracy)
I can't wait to see it! Best of luck to you! If you need any help, feel free to reach out - I've done several cosplays myself! ^-^

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=9N7FioFR,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2014-11-18T05:38:29.275+0000)
>
> I can't wait to see it! Best of luck to you! If you need any help, feel free to reach out - I've done several cosplays myself! ^-^

A few things changed, and we just ended up with 2 soldiers (and one spear between us lol). Here's a pic of us with an Azir we ran into at Fanime, and another one of just me with another Azir I ran into later that day:

http://imgur.com/dBBrm3a,K6FSpON#0

(visit the link for the second picture, I forgot the boards can't show subsequent pictures with imgur)

Oh wow, this came out awesome! Great work! How long did it take you to complete?

Also, thanks for remembering me! ^-^

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=9N7FioFR,comment-id=000200000000,timestamp=2015-08-03T20:45:01.565+0000)
>
> Oh wow, this came out awesome! Great work! How long did it take you to complete?
> 
> Also, thanks for remembering me! ^-^

Ty! Sorry it took so long to post the pictures. We were supposed to be working on this for several months, but, like most cosplayers, we ended up procrastinating and finishing it 7 hours before we left for the con..... Most of the work was done over a month, with like 6 hrs/week for the first 2 weeks, then ramped it up to 12/week for the last 2 before the con. We put in maybe 15 hrs of work before that, but I really don't count that cause it was mainly messing around and we didn't use anything we made during that time.
Awesome! Thanks a ton! I'll make sure to post some pictures of the cosplay on the forums when it's finished so you can see it (it'll take a long time, though. The planned debut is in May)
